---
category: news
title: "New cheat software claims to work on ‘any console’ via machine learning"
excerpt: "A new piece of cheat software claims to utilise machine learning to allow players to use auto aim on “any console”. The software, which was highlighted by anti-cheat group ACPD, reportedly utilises PC passthrough via network streaming or a capture card to bypass console platform security."
